help-file.title: HASTE
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
"Haste" grants the victim a faster pulse speed, allowing them to hit more often than without it. It also adds an archery hit, allowing an archer to hit more often. When used on casters, it allows them to cast their spell more quickly.
